actions.recommendation: Mammogram request was given to you because some dense cystic changes found upon breast examination - please discuss the results with your GP
Gastroenterology booking for screening Colonoscopy is due over the age of 50. Please make an appointment.
Your Vit D was suboptimal. Please replace with 5000iu as prescribed and repeat levels in 3/12, aiming for levels of 50-80
You are fair skinned and have a skin tag you want removed and some moles. Mole mapping at a dermatologist recommended.
Cholesterol was raised. You follow a Keto diet and we discussed limiting red meat and alcohol. Increasing fatty fish, supplement with Omega 3. Repeat levels in 3/12
